basic_info.name: Costway Ergonomic Office Chair PU Leather Executive Swivel with Flip-up Armrests Brown/White/Black
basic_info.short_description:
This executive office chair is a premium seating option designed for maximum comfort and functionality. With its ergonomic design and thickened seat cushion, it provides optimal support for prolonged sitting sessions. There is a tension control knob(tight & loose) and lifting lever (up & down) under the seat for your easy adjustment. The adjustment lever enables you to pull out to turn on rocking function and push in to turn off rocking function. Users can lean back and relax, perfect for quick breaks or moments of relaxation. Its 360° swivel and adjustable height mechanism enable effortless movement and customization, ensuring a comfortable seating position for individuals of all sizes. The chair is made of selected high quality materials, built with a solid and stable construction, ensuring durability and reliability even with daily use. Equipped with PU universal casters, it offers smooth and quiet movement across various floor surfaces without leaving any marks or scratches. Overall, the ergonomic office chair combines comfort, style, and functionality to enhance any workspace.


Features
Waterfall seat cushion and contoured lumbar support offer extra comfort
Supportive s-curved back relieves stress on your spine
Rocking function for relaxation (90°-105° angle range)
PU leather upholstered armrests can be flipped up as needed
PU universal casters for smooth rolling on different floors
360° swivel and height adjustable seat meets different needs
PU leather surface is skin-friendly, ultra-soft and stretch
Equipped with 5 smooth rolling casters for easy movement
Superior gas lift cylinder and a 5-claw base for stability
Widely used in the living room, bedroom, study and office, etc
Convenient to assemble with clear user manual



Color: Brown/White/Black
Material: PU Leather, Sponge, Nylon, Wood
Overall Dimension: 28.5" x 28.5" x 42.5"-46.5" (L x W x H)
Backrest Size: 21.5" x 25.5" (L x W)
Seat Size: 21.5" x 20" (L x W)
Seat Height: 19.5"-23.5"
Thickness of Seat: 5"
Length Between Armrests: 27"
Height from Armrests to Ground: 27.5"-31.5"
Net Weight: 33.5 lbs
Weight Capacity: 350 lbs
Package Includes:
1 x Office Chair
1 x User Guide

care_instructions: Care & Cleaning: Spot or Wipe Clean
highlights: Ergonomic Design for Comfort: This task chair features a waterfall seat cushion covered with skin-friendly PU leather and filled with high-density sponge padding for a cozy sitting experience. The contoured headrest, backrest and lumbar support fits your body curves for extra comfort.

Rocking Function & Flip-up Armrests: You can lock/unlock the 90°-105° rocking function with the adjustable lever to relax during breaks. What's more, this office chair features 0-90° flip-up armrests, allowing you to flip down to support your arms and flip up to save space.

Durable & Stable Construction: Equipped with a premium gas lift cylinder and a stable 5-claw base, this ergonomic office chair can hold up to 350 lbs. What's more, the superior PU leather surface is waterproof and wear-resistant, ensuring durability and longevity.

PU Universal Casters: This swivel desk chair is designed with 5 universal casters that are both quiet and wear-resistant. Users can move the chair smoothly on different surfaces such as carpet, tile and wood floors, accessing different areas without any hassle.

recent_reviews.text: The chair is very comfortable and the arms that move up and down are great to put at the desk.
recent_reviews.title: Comfortable Chair

recent_reviews.text: The office chair is as comfortable as expected, but we're having trouble fixing one of the wheels. We'll need to buy new ones.
recent_reviews.title: Office chair

recent_reviews.text: I’ve had this chair for months now and so sorry that I didn’t return it when I first started having issues. It squeaks so much and has consistently gotten worse over time. In the beginning I assumed it would eventually “settle” and stop the squeaking. I’ve had my husband take it apart and make sure everything was correctly installed and it’s still pretty bad. My 80 lb son sits on it and same issues. It’s so bad now that I can’t sit down while on work calls and Target will not accept a return on a detective item!
recent_reviews.title: Beware of the annoying squeaks

recent_reviews.text: The color is not like picture, its a dark beige, doesn’t match any color desk very well
recent_reviews.title: Not color in picture

recent_reviews.text: I bought this chair based on reviews, but I guess comfort is subjective. It well packed, however, one of the most uncomfortable chairs I’ve sat on. It’s extremely firm. Customer support charges $30 for refund, and 30 days processing time. Avoid.
recent_reviews.title: Stiff chair.

recent_reviews.text: Great chair bought it to use at school needed something comfortable
recent_reviews.title: Chair

recent_reviews.text: Very nice chair for the price, comfortable and easy to assemble. Height of back and seat size were perfect for my size; I’m 5’4”. Only issue for some may be the color. This chair is not white; it is a light beige or dark cream. Wasn’t an issue for me but those hoping to match white decor may be disappointed.
recent_reviews.title: Very Nice Chair

recent_reviews.text: Excellent chair and great price. I bought two.
recent_reviews.title: This one is awesome
